commits.author: Doron Cohen
commits.sourceNew: /** Checks the internal cache for an appropriate entry, and if none is found, * reads the terms in field as bytes and returns an array of * size reader.maxDoc() of the value each document has in the * given field. * @param reader Used to get field values. * @param field Which field contains the bytes. * @param parser Computes byte for string values. * @return The values in the given field for each document. * @throws IOException If any error occurs. */ public byte[] getBytes (IndexReader reader, String field, ByteParser parser) throws IOException;
